COMPANY ONLINE PURCHASE POLICY

Privacy Policy

All the information obtained in this site is strictly for our own customer service use. We will not sell or release your personal information to any third party personnel or company.

Payment terms

Payment will be done via a secure link on the ELP website.

Customers will pay by any credit card issued by the Mauritius Commercial Bank.

ELP will not be liable if your card has been lost or stolen, leading to no refund, once payment has been made.

By indicating the userâ€™s acceptance to purchase any product or service offered on the website, (s)he is obligated to complete such transactions. Users shall prohibit from indicating its acceptance to purchase products and services where (s)he does not intend to complete such transactions.

Any order placed for a product that is listed at an incorrect price may be cancelled. This shall be regardless of whether the order has been confirmed and/or payment levied. In the event the payment has been processed, the same shall be credited to your account and duly notified to you by email.

In the event that a non-delivery occurs on account of a mistake by you (i.e. wrong name or shipping address), an extra cost for the re-delivery of the products shall be claimed from the user placing the order.

Shipment/delivery time of order processing starts from the day the order is placed with elpmauritius.com. Usually all orders are processed and shipped within 1-5 working days.

Return policy

ELP will provide its online customers with the possibility to return or exchange faulty books (subject to verification by our staff).

In case a customer receives a faulty book, (s)he will have to send an email at webmail@elpmauritius.com with the invoice number, item number, quantity and a picture of the faulty book which must be attached to the mail as proof.

Our sales person will then revert back via email to notify about the return application. If return is accepted, a Purchase Return Order Quote will be sent to you via email within 3 working days.

Payment effected for sold out books will lead to a refund to your bank account or necessary actions will be taken.

Conditions:

ELP must be contacted within 15 days upon receipt of books for return to be taken into consideration.
